actions.args: {"id": 197, "body": {"name": "DevHub & DevRel (01 - 31 August) Contributor Report", "summary": "Monthly paid developer relations contributor report. The aim of these activities is to onboard more developers to the ecosystem, and assist existing developers with problems or enrich their experience in the ecosystem. Activities for the last month can be seen below.", "category": "Decentralized DevRel", "timeline": {"status": "APPROVED", "kyc_verified": true, "sponsor_requested_review": false, "reviewer_completed_attestation": false}, "supervisor": "gagdiez.near", "description": "##### 1. DevRel Contribution (supervised by @gagdiez.near)\\\\n\\\\n* Internal Meetings - weekly stand-up, 1-1 with team members (4h)\\\\n* Building [Abstract DAO contract](https://github.com/nearuaguild/abstract-dao) with Chain Signatures (32h)\\\\n* Research UI options for Abstract DAO (2h)\\\\n\\\\n**Timeline**\\\\nStart Date: 8/01/2024\\\\nEnd Date: 8/31/2024\\\\n\\\\n**Funding**\\\\nTotal hours: 38\\\\nRate: $50/hour\\\\nAmount: $1.900 USD\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n##### 2. DevHub Contribution (supervised by @frol.near)\\\\n\\\\n**Community Support (5 hours)**\\\\n* Provide support to community members and clean spam in Near Dev chat (3h)\\\\n* Mentorship 1-on-1 Meetings (2h)\\\\n\\\\n**Educational Content (21 hours)**\\\\n* Weekly live streams with the community (4h 30m) - [1](https://t.me/nearprotocoluachannel/1062), [2](https://t.me/nearprotocoluachannel/1071)\\\\n* YouTube video production (7h 30m) - [1](https://youtu.be/QP4Clv70h1E), [2](https://youtu.be/P_wl-EUi7N4)\\\\n* Livestream preparation, environment set up, promotion (6h)\\\\n* Transalate YouTube recording of community call into text article/post for organic promotion (3h) - [1](https://medium.com/@nearuaguild/blockchain-\\\\u{43d}\\\\u{430}-\\\\u{43a}\\\\u{43e}\\\\u{436}\\\\u{43d}\\\\u{43e}\\\\u{43c}\\\\u{443}-\\\\u{43a}\\\\u{440}\\\\u{43e}\\\\u{446}\\\\u{456}-\\\\u{430}\\\\u{43b}\\\\u{435}-\\\\u{447}\\\\u{438}-\\\\u{434}\\\\u{456}\\\\u{439}\\\\u{441}\\\\u{43d}\\\\u{43e}-\\\\u{432}\\\\u{456}\\\\u{43d}-\\\\u{43a}\\\\u{440}\\\\u{430}\\\\u{449}\\\\u{438}\\\\u{439}-\\\\u{437}\\\\u{430}-\\\\u{437}\\\\u{432}\\\\u{438}\\\\u{447}\\\\u{43d}\\\\u{438}\\\\u{439}-postgres-67e6ca8469d0), [2](https://www.linkedin.com/feed/update/urn:li:activity:7229902164624588801)\\\\n\\\\n**Timeline**\\\\nStart Date: 8/01/2024\\\\nEnd Date: 8/31/2024\\\\n\\\\n**Funding**\\\\nTotal hours: 26\\\\nRate: $50/hour\\\\nTotal amount: $1.300 USD\\\\n\\\\nTotal funding\\\\n$3.200 USD", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "denbite.near", "requested_sponsor": "neardevdao.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "3200", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDC"}, "labels": []}

{"data": {"post": {"main": "{\\\\\\\"type\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"md\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"image\\\\\\\":{\\\\\\\"ipfs_cid\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"bafybeid5namxqnxyplmhcykvlsapkswjjlerkyhiew6lrsr2gpuha3eoba\\\\\\\"},\\\\\\\"text\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"Contract verification, AI, easy onboarding, protocol, infrastructure, tooling. \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n[This weeks edition of NEAR Dev News has it all!](https://mailchi.mp/neardevhub/near-dev-news-28)\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nDon\\\\\\'t forget to [SUBSCRIBE](https://newsletter.neardevhub.org/) to get dev news straight to your email!\\\\\\\"}"}, "index": {"post": "{\\\\\\\"key\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"main\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"value\\\\\\\":{\\\\\\\"type\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"md\\\\\\\"}}"}}, "handle": "neardevnews"}

{"data": {"neardevnews.community.devhub.near": {"post": {"main": "{\\\\\\\"type\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"md\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"image\\\\\\\":{\\\\\\\"ipfs_cid\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"bafybeid5namxqnxyplmhcykvlsapkswjjlerkyhiew6lrsr2gpuha3eoba\\\\\\\"},\\\\\\\"text\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"Contract verification, AI, easy onboarding, protocol, infrastructure, tooling. \\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n[This weeks edition of NEAR Dev News has it all!](https://mailchi.mp/neardevhub/near-dev-news-28)\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nDon\\\\\\'t forget to [SUBSCRIBE](https://newsletter.neardevhub.org/) to get dev news straight to your email!\\\\\\\"}"}, "index": {"post": "{\\\\\\\"key\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"main\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"value\\\\\\\":{\\\\\\\"type\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"md\\\\\\\"}}"}}}}

{"body": {"name": "DevHub Developer Contributor report by Megha for 08/12/2024 - 09/08/2024", "summary": "Setup Devhub treasury with payment requests and members configuration, fixed few bugs on Devhub, did investigation on how to integrate ref finance SDK on BOS for asset exchange, setup api repo.", "category": "DevDAO Platform", "timeline": {"status": "DRAFT"}, "supervisor": "theori.near", "description": "#### Summary of Activities\\\\n\\\\n##### Week 1 (12 August to 18 August)\\\\n\\\\n- Chat with Peter and Frol about ref finance integration for asset exchange (1.5h)\\\\n- Go through Ref finance docs to get details of valid tokens, chat with their dev about how to use SDK on BOS, go through contract and UI code to understand pool, fees and route for swap (1d)\\\\n- Add UI for create exchange page, select pools, check for sufficient balance [#54](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/54) (2.5d)\\\\n- Call with Ori and Vova about payment requests and asset exchange (1.5h)\\\\n- Work on UI improvements and enhancements for payment requests and members page, update the tests to support new flow [#42](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/42) (1.5d) \\\\n- Call with Peter regarding caching of txn history and bug with clearing the form inputs (0.5h)\\\\n\\\\nTotal : 43.5 hours\\\\n\\\\n##### Week 2 (19 August to 25 August)\\\\n\\\\n- Fix the clearing of form inputs, check the issue with creating request on near org and other UI improvements [#44](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/44) (4h)\\\\n- Change the APIs for txn history to use nearblocks to improve performance, add support for FT tokens balance change [#45](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/45) (6h)\\\\n- Call with Ori (20 mins)\\\\n- Team sync call (1h)\\\\n- Call with Ori and Vova about NF feedback (1h)\\\\n- Fix the fractal fetch issue on devhub and other instances [#927](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/927) (0.5h)\\\\n- Fix the bugs and enhancements suggested by NF team [#46](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/46) (2d)\\\\n- Discuss with Peter and Vlad about issues with nearblocks API for txn history balances, checkout pikespeak API, share the issue with free and plan (3h)\\\\n- Discuss with Peter to add script to run the local web4 gateway, have call with him regarding issues with design changes, update web4 login UI as per design [#43](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/43) (1d)\\\\n\\\\nTotal : 40 hours\\\\n\\\\n##### Week 3 (26 August to 1 Sept)\\\\n\\\\n- Add near social API get to fetch profile data and display for logout [#43](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/43) (3h)\\\\n- Discuss with Vova about NF 2nd enhancements review and make changes to UI [#47](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/47) [#48](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/48) (1d)\\\\n- Reply to Trentin queries with issues regarding infra, create ticket for the bugs [#929](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/issues/929) (1h)\\\\n- Team call (0.5h)\\\\n- Call with Peter and Thomas regarding subquery (1h)\\\\n- Review PRs (0.5h)\\\\n- Add pikespeak API for txns history, use open for BOS and pass paid from web4 viewer for web4 [#49](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/49) (1d)\\\\n- Discuss with Peter about failing tests on web4 and working fine on bos gateway and fix the issue [#43](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/43) (1h)\\\\n- Checkout the self creation treasury flow UI (0.5h)\\\\n- Try using ref finance SDK CDN in iframe, try solving the errors, try with contract methods to get swap amount, contact Nature from Ref to get possible solutions (2d)\\\\n\\\\nTotal : 39.5 hours\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n##### Week 4 (Sept 2 to 8 Sept)\\\\n\\\\n- Chat with Ori and Vlad to setup sputnik account for devhub treasury, setup necessary groups and permissions, fund the contract, remove deposit requirement from UI and sputnik configuration, transfer stables from testing dao (3h)\\\\n- Call with Peter to discuss about ref finance SDK, share the conclusion with Ori and Vlad (1h)\\\\n- Do more research on ways to swap tokens, share the SDK API on chat (2h)\\\\n- Update markdown viewer, autoset iframe and div height, add preview to blog using tailwind styles, fix failing tests  [#931](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-bos/pull/931) (1.5d)\\\\n- Team call and sync with Ori  about asset exchange (1h)\\\\n- Create reusability in treasury repo, separate config for instances (testing and devhub prod), deploy base components on just one account and config on instance specific, remove deposit for add proposal [#50](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/50) (1d)\\\\n- Call with Vova regarding asset exchange (10 mins)\\\\n- Discussion with Peter regarding different UI on web4 gateway (0.5h) \\\\n- Fix bugs with treasury, register account in case of FT tokens transfer if not registered [#53](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/neardevhub-treasury-dashboard/pull/53) (4h)\\\\n- Checkout new design for asset exchange (20 mins)\\\\n- Chat with Pikespeak devs regarding 404 API response (0.5h)\\\\n- Initialize ref sdk [repo](https://github.com/NEAR-DevHub/ref-sdk-api), add prettier and lint, setup APIs using ref finance SDK to get pool and token information (1d) \\\\n\\\\nTotal : 40.5 hours\\\\n\\\\nTotal Hours: 163.5\\\\nHourly rate: $50/h\\\\nTotal: 8175 USD", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "megha19.near", "requested_sponsor": "neardevdao.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "8175", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "OTHER"}, "labels": [], "accepted_terms_and_conditions_version": 127741919}

{"data": {"devhub.near": {"post": {"main": "{\\\\\\\"type\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"md\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"text\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"We have just received a new *DevDAO Platform* proposal.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**By**: @megha19.near\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Title**: \\\\u{201c}DevHub Developer Contributor report by Megha for 08/12/2024 - 09/08/2024\\\\u{201c}\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Summary**:\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nSetup Devhub treasury with payment requests and members configuration, fixed few bugs on Devhub, did investigation on how to integrate ref finance SDK on BOS for asset exchange, setup api repo.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nRead the full proposal and share your feedback on [DevHub](/devhub.near/widget/app?page=proposal&id=201)\\\\\\\"}"}, "index": {"post": "{\\\\\\\"key\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"main\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"value\\\\\\\":{\\\\\\\"type\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"md\\\\\\\"}}"}}}}
